articles.description: "Honestly since I was at Liverpool that feels like one of the biggest Champions League nights," Klopp said after the win over Ajax.
articles.content:
Anfield was empty, the Liverpool team depleted by injury and it was hardly a vintage performance but the 1-0 win over Ajax Amsterdam on Tuesday still left manager Jurgen Klopp bursting with pride.

articles.title: New date set as courts shift de Belin trial to Sydney - Fox Sports
articles.description: St George Illawarra lock Jack de Belin has a new court date after the jury was unable to reach a verdict in his rape trial.
articles.content:
The NSW Origin forward and Callan Sinclair are accused of sexually assaulting a woman at a Wollongong apartment in December 2018. Both deny the charges.
The jury deliberated for a total of 10 hours … [+1090 chars]

articles.title: Why Naden could cop just a one month ban despite testing positive to cocaine - Fox Sports
articles.description: Panthers star Brent Naden could escape a lengthy ban for testing positive to cocaine on grand final day and instead serve just one to three months on the sideline.
articles.content:
The 24-year-old was provisionally suspended on Tuesday under the NRLs Anti-Doping policy.
Naden is facing up to a two-year ban, but that could be reduced to one to three months if he can prove the d… [+4835 chars]
